resources.string: Batman, the Dark Knight, fights through the night, In Gotham City, he battles crime with all his might. His gadgets and stealth bring justice to the fight.
Superman, the Man of Steel, soars through the sky, Defender of truth and justice, his purpose held high. With superhuman strength, he saves lives without a sigh.
Wonder Woman, Amazon warrior, fierce and bold, Protector of the innocent, her story unfolds. With lasso and shield, she fights for justice untold.
Iron Man, genius inventor, armored and strong, Battles evil with technology all day long. His wit and repulsor blasts never go wrong.
Captain America, patriotic and true, Embodies courage and the red, white, and blue. With shield in hand, he fights for justice through and through.
SpiderMan, agile and quick as can be, Swinging through the city with webs so free. With great power comes great responsibility, he will always agree.
